FAQ.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Find answers to our most common queries.

q1.question: What is your typical project timeline?
q1.answer: Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity. A standard corporate website typically takes 4-6 weeks, while complex web applications may take 3-6 months. We provide a detailed timeline during the proposal phase.

q2.question: Do you provide ongoing support and maintenance?
q2.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive support and maintenance packages to ensure your digital products remain secure, up-to-date, and perform optimally long after the initial launch.

q3.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
q3.answer: We specialize in modern frontend frameworks like React and Next.js, versatile backends using Node.js and PostgreSQL, and robust cloud infrastructure on AWS, Vercel, and Supabase.

q4.question: How does your pricing work?
q4.answer: Our pricing is project-based, tailored to your specific requirements. We conduct discovery sessions to understand your needs fully before providing a transparent, detailed proposal.

q5.question: Can you help with digital strategy and SEO?
q5.answer: Absolutely. Our services go beyond coding; we incorporate SEO best practices from day one and offer strategic consulting to ensure your product achieves maximum visibility and success.
